0.1.name: wordpress/spreadx
0.1.description: A lightweight plugin that will add the submit buttons for Digg, Stumble, Del.icio.us, Slashdot, Twitter, Mixx, Dzone, Sphinn, Google, and Technorati to the bottom of posts. It can be configured to only show some of those options or all of them.
